channel.title: SoftLayer_User_Customer_OpenIdConnect_TrustedProfile on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_User_Customer_OpenIdConnect_TrustedProfile on SoftLayer API

item.title: acknowledgeSupportPolicy
item.description:
REST Example 

curl -g -u $SL_USER:$SL_APIKEY -X GET \
'https://api.softlayer.com/rest/v3.1/SoftLayer_User_Customer_OpenIdConnect_TrustedProfile/{SoftLayer_User_Customer_OpenIdConnect_TrustedProfileID}/acknowledgeSupportPolicy'
